exercise.p: Translate the diagram of algebra tiles into an equation.
Use a diagram of algebra tiles to factor x^2 + 8x + 15. Draw the diagram and write the final equation.

aside.p: You may want to do some actual scratch work on scratch paper for this.

exercise.p: Fill in the appropriate value into the boxes, then use the method to factor the given quadratic polynomial using a complete presentation.
Use a diagram of algebra tiles to factor 2x^2 + 9x + 4. Draw the diagram and write the final equation.

aside.p: Put both of your x^2 tiles on the top left corner.
